mapper.select: SELECT uid, created_at, updated_at, deleted_flag, used_flag, `code`, currency_code, currency_name, country, `name`, `date`, `time`, recurrence_count, base_price, opening_price, high_price, low_price, `change`, change_price, cash_buying_price, cash_selling_price, tt_buying_price, tt_selling_price, tc_buying_price, fc_selling_price, exchange_commission, us_dollar_rate, high52w_price, high52w_date, low52w_price, low52w_date, currency_unit, provider, signed_change_price, signed_change_rate, change_rate FROM exchange WHERE deleted_flag = false AND used_flag = true AND code = #{name}
